cards.title: Greyhat
body: Dial Up
powers: Draw 1 Card. If this is the first power used this turn, draw 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Coerced Uplink
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals that target 2 Lightning Damage. Then, if this is the first card played this turn, you may play 1 card.

cards.title: Digital Uplink
body: Play this card next to a Hero other than {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, that Hero may draw 2 cards. Then, if this is the first card played this turn, you may play a card.

cards.title: Flare Relay
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals up to 3 Targets 1 Fire Damage. Then, if this is the first card played this turn, you may play 1 card.
The hero next to this card gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] This hero deals 1 Target 3 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Proxy Relay
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} regains 2 HP. Then, if this is the first card played this turn, you may play a card.
The hero next to this card gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Draw 1 Card. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to this hero by 1.

cards.title: Communication Relay
body: Play this card next to {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, you may destroy an Ongoing or Environment card. Then, if this is the first card played this turn, you may play 1 card.
The hero next to this card gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Play 1 Card.

cards.title: Direct Control
body: Each Hero next to a Link in their play area may use a power.
Each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals themselves 2 Melee Damage.
If this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Stop... Oh, who am {BR}I kidding. Keep hitting yourself!

cards.title: Shock Therapy
body: Each Hero next to a Link regains 2 HP.
{Greyhat} deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals 2 Lightning Damage.
If this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.

flavorQuotes.text: You may feel a slight tingle.

cards.title: Data Transfer
body: Each Player draws a card for each of their Heroes next to a link.
{Greyhat} deals each non-Hero Target next to a link 2 Psychic Damage.
If this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.

cards.title: DDoS
body: Each Hero next to a link deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link 1 Energy Damage.
If this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.

cards.title: Bandwidth Restriction
body: When this card enters play, if this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.
Reduce damage dealt to Heroes next to a Link by non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Overclock Systems
body: When this card enters play, if this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.
Increase damage dealt by Heroes next to a Link to non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Auto-Redirect
body: When this card enters play, if this is the first card played this turn, you may draw 2 cards.
The first time each turn a Hero next to a Link would be dealt 2 or fewer damage, you may redirect that damage to a non-Hero target next to a link.

cards.title: System Reboot
body: Shuffle your trash into your deck.
Search your deck for a Link and put it in your hand.
Put any number of Links in play back in your hand.
You may play a number of Link cards equal to the number of Links returned to your hand by this card.

cards.title: Ping Sweep
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until 2 Links have been revealed. Play those Links. Shuffle the other revealed cards into your deck.

cards.title: Node Check
body: You may draw a card.
Search your deck for a Link and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.

promoCards.title: Greyhat - Burst Noise
body: Burst Noise
powers: {Greyhat} deals 1 Target 1 Sonic Damage. 1 Target next to a Link deals that Target 1 Sonic Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Too much noise in the signal - time to clean it up.
